entry.title: A wild new blog appears
entry.content: And with a magical command I’ve created a new blog! Since Iâ€™ve always had an itch to write, but never have had the discipline to sit down and use pen and paper, this blog will suffice. It is both a one stop shop for my musings on film, video games, and programming and a workshop for my writing skills which need improvement, badly. Now go forth and read a post!
